name: William Gibson: The Game (So Bad It's Good Game Jam 2018)
name_original: William Gibson: The Game (So Bad It's Good Game Jam 2018)
description:
Made for the 2018 So Bad It's Good game jam! Theme: cyberpunk.

You are seminal cyberpunk author William Gibson sitting down to write a novel. Can you catch all the information as it flies at you, wrack up a high score, and invent the cyberpunk future?

(With apologies to Mr. Gibson. Disclaimer: actual writing of Neuromancer may not have occurred as depicted.)
